title: Moved to Ebay 1911 T205 Gold Border, Frank Chance

posts.post_title: Moved to Ebay 1911 T205 Gold Border, Frank Chance
posts.post_content:
Hello Everyone,

I have this 1911 T205 Gold Border Tobacco Card of Frank Chance for sale. Nicely centered. Some staining on the reverse.

Price: Moved to eBay.

Payment: Paypal (f/f please), check, or money order are all acceptable.

First response with a commitment to purchase gets the card.

Thanks for looking,

Joe
